actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.
Committee on Veterans requested executive comment from OMB; VA.
Committee on Veterans. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure S. 2385 ordered to be reported.
Committee on Veterans received executive comment from VA. Favorable.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to extend for one year the authority for the provision of Veterans' Administration health care by contract in the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico and in the Virgin Islands.

summary.text: Extends for one year the authority of the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to contract for hospital care or medical services in Puerto Rico and the Virgin Islands without reference to patient loads or incidence of provision of medical services for veterans treated by the Veterans Administration in the contiguous 48 states.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to extend for one year the authority for the provision of Veterans' Administration health care by contract in the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico and in the Virgin Islands.
